nodes.text: The Venom Guard was an elite unit within special forces of the Imperial Navy.

Venom Guard, a military unit of the Imperial Special Forces from the Imperial Navy special forces, was contacted by Moff Sakai of Thuris sector once he had discovered the names of the Rebel agents that were importuning him. The Guard then began to chase those Rebels, members of the elite unit Reekeene's Roughnecks.
